name: CSSNamespaceRule
description: The CSSNamespaceRule interface describes an object representing a single CSS @namespace at-rule. It implements the CSSRule interface, with a type value of 10 (CSSRule.NAMESPACE_RULE).

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM)
refs.description: The definition of 'CSSNamespaceRule' in CSS Object Model (CSSOM).
